pages.text: The Warp Nexus is a central location for all players! Inside the nexus are portals to the End, the Nether, the Twilight Forest, and the Deeper Dark dimension!$(br2)To quickly get to the nexus, use $(c:/warp nexus)/warp nexus$(/c)

pages.title: Sharestone Network
pages.text: At the nexus is one of each sharestone to be used to travel from!$(br2)All networks are $(l)player created and player maintained$().$(br2)If you find or create an area that you'd like to share, put it on the corresponding sharestone network!

pages.title: Colorless Network
pages.text: The Colorless Sharestone Network is for $(l)Player Bases!$()$(br2)This is the only sharestone you should ever place at your personal base.

pages.title: White Network
pages.text: The White Sharestone Network is for $(l)Roleplay Locations!$()$(br2)We do not currently have any Roleplay initiatives on the server, so this Network is not in use.

pages.title: Orange Network
pages.text: The Orange Sharestone Network is for $(l)Farms & Machines!$()$(br2)These are player builds. If you've created a farm you'd like to share, place one of these Sharestones!

pages.title: Magenta Network
pages.text: The Magenta Sharestone Network is for $(l)University of Hexhaven!$()$(br2)This is an upcoming player-run project to teach the community how to use various mods.

pages.title: Light Blue Network
pages.text: The Light Blue Sharestone Network is for $(l)Events!$()$(br2)Events may be official or player-created. Add your events or minigames to this network!

pages.title: Yellow Network
pages.text: The Yellow Sharestone Network is for $(l)Overworld loot!$()$(br2)You are encouraged to add yellow sharestones to any juicy loot locations you find in the Overworld.

pages.title: Lime Network
pages.text: This Network is for $(l)Public Villages!$()$(br2)You are encouraged to add lime sharestones to villages that are scenic or have helpful villagers. Do not abduct any villagers!

pages.title: Pink Network
pages.text: This Network is for $(l)dangerous loot!$()$(br2)These locations may contain traps, lava, or dangerous mobs. When placing, take care to put the Sharestone itself out of harm's way.

pages.title: Gray Network
pages.text: This Network is for $(l)Fishing Spots or Biomes!$()$(br2)Aquaculture's fish are found in different biomes, and sometimes, you just want a safe spot to sit and cast!

pages.title: Light Gray Network
pages.text: The Light Gray Sharestone Network is not used yet!

pages.title: Cyan Network
pages.text: This Network is for $(l)the Twilight Forest!$()$(br2)This network is reset every 3 months when the dimension is reset. New sharestone locations are always encouraged!

pages.title: Purple Network
pages.text: This Network is for $(l)the End!$()$(br2)This network is reset every 3 months when the dimension is reset. New sharestone locations are always encouraged!

pages.title: Blue Network
pages.text: The Blue Sharestone Network is for $(l)Monuments!$()$(br2)Monuments are just large structures built for aesthetics.

pages.title: Blue Network
pages.text: Some may have lore, and others may be just for looks! If you are building a Monument, be considerate of your proximity to player bases.

pages.title: Brown Network
pages.text: The Brown Sharestone Network is for $(l)Biomes in the Overworld!$()$(br2)The biomes on this network are protected national parks.

pages.title: Brown Network
pages.text: You may come to collect and replant trees, find mobs, or locate a general climate to base near. Please do not destroy or claim land within 6 chunks of the sharestone. You are welcome to add new biomes- they must be in good condition and not lived in already!

pages.title: Green Network
pages.text: The Green Sharestone Network is for $(l)shops!$()$(br2)These locations are immersive builds, cute one-off shop ideas, or otherwise 'unofficial' shops.

pages.title: Green Network
pages.text: For shops that reside within the official districts, check out the shopping nexus!$(br2)You can learn more about the difference here: $(l:patchouli:shopping_district)Shopping District

pages.title: Red Network
pages.text: The Red Sharestone Network is for $(l)the Nether!$()$(br2)This Network is unique! Some locations may be permanently within the build border of 1,536 blocks.

pages.title: Red Network
pages.text: Others will be in what we refer it as the Outerlands.$(br2)Locations outside of the build border are reset every 3 months.

pages.title: Black Network
pages.text: This Network is for $(l)Outerland locations!$()$(br2)This network is reset every 3 months when the dimension is reset. New sharestone locations are always encouraged!

pages.title: Black Network
pages.text: Read more about the Outerlands here: $(l:patchouli:outerlands/the_outerlands)Click$()
